wikipedia_page.main: Madge Tree (1875–1947) was a British actress of the silent era.She was born in West Derby, Liverpool and died in Paddington, London.

response: | What Every Woman Knows || Fred W. Durrant || Hilda Trevelyan, Madge Tree, Maud Yates || Comedy ||

What Every Woman Knows is a 1917 British comedy drama film directed by Fred W. Durrant and starring Hilda Trevelyan, Madge Tree and Maud Yates.BFI entry on film It is an adaptation of the 1908 play What Every Woman Knows by J.M. Barrie. American versions were filmed in 1921 and 1934.

St. Elmo is a 1923 British silent drama film directed by Rex Wilson and starring Shayle Gardner, Gabrielle Gilroy and Madge Tree.BFI | Film & TV Database | ST. ELMO (1923) It was an adaptation of the 1866 novel St. Elmo by Augusta Jane Evans. An American adaptation St. Elmo was released the same year.
